item.title: This 1995 Sci-Fi Written By James Cameron & Starring Ralph Fiennes Made Just $17 Million, But Deserves Another Look
item.description: James Cameron’s cyberpunk film Strange Days (1995) was a box office flop, but today, this dark tech noir thriller is more relevant than ever.

item.title: Original Back To The Future Stars Reunite 40 Years Later To Recreate Iconic Scene
item.description: 40 years after the movie’s release, actor Michael J. Fox reunites with a Back to the Future costar to recreate a memorable Marty McFly scene.

item.title: Controversial Romance Movie Starring Game Of Thrones Actor Finds Streaming Success 9 Years Later
item.description: Emilia Clarke may be best known for playing Daenerys Targaryen in Game of Thrones, but it is her 2016 romance movie that is surging on streaming now.
